remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a uniformly continuous function from uniform space ` U ` to uniform space ` V ` ."  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)
statement:
isucn $p |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ V e. ( UnifOn ` Y ) ) -> ( F e. ( U uCn V ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. s e. V E. r e. U A. x e. X A. y e. X ( x r y -> ( F ` x ) s ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d F r s x y $.
$d U r s x y $.
$d V r s x $.
$d X r s x y $.
$d Y r s x $.
